sentences.sContent: Children scampered off the yellow school bus and into the playground.
sentences.sCn: 孩子们跑下黄颜色的校车，奔跑进了操场。

synos.tran: 蹦蹦跳跳；奔跑，惊惶奔跑

remMethod.val: s(音似： 嘶) + camper(露营者) → 露营者嘶喊着快跑 → 快跑

trans.tranOther: When people or small animals scamper somewhere, they move there quickly with small, light steps
